depthDescriptions.BASIC: These foundational questions help us understand the basics of who you are and what you're looking for.
depthDescriptions.ADVANCED: These questions invite a bit more reflection, helping us see the nuances of your personality and values.
depthDescriptions.EXPERT: These are deep-dive questions that reveal your core beliefs and how you navigate complex situations.

hero.title2: You need to know what you truly want
hero.subtitle1: An in-depth questionnaire that helps you understand yourself, what truly matters to you,
hero.subtitle3: for you - a roadmap to the relationship you're really looking for.
hero.timeEstimate: 20-30 minutes that will save you months of searching

problemSection.title1: â€œSo, what are you really looking for?â€
problemSection.title2: ...and the standard answer that doesn't help

generalAnswers.title: Vague Answers
generalAnswers.description: â€œSomeone nice,â€ â€œwith similar values,â€ â€œsomeone fun to be withâ€ - but what does that really mean? How will you know when you've found it?

wastedTime.title: Wasted Time and Energy
wastedTime.description: Dates that end with "it's not a match" because you didn't really understand what you were looking for in the first place. Every date feels like trial and error.

lackOfFocus.title: Lack of Focus
lackOfFocus.description: It's hard to explain to matchmakers what's truly important to you, hard to know if a suggestion is a good fit, hard to make decisions.

frustration.title: Frustration and Insecurity
frustration.description: The feeling that maybe you just don't know what you want, or perhaps you're looking for something that doesn't exist.

problemSection.insight: ğŸ’¡ How can you find the right one, if you don't know what you truly want?

solutionSection.title: A Questionnaire That
solutionSection.subtitle1: 20 minutes of focused questions to help you understand what truly matters to you,
solutionSection.subtitle2: and at the end, you'll receive a detailed personal report - a roadmap to the relationship you're looking for.

selfDiscovery.title: True Self-Discovery
selfDiscovery.description: The questionnaire guides you through a structured process that helps you understand what's truly important to you in life and relationships - beyond generic phrases.

fullPicture.title: Get Your 'Full Picture'
fullPicture.description: Upon completion, you'll receive a detailed and personal PDF document that distills all your insights - a clear view of who you are and what you're looking for.

focusedSearch.title: Focused and Efficient Search
focusedSearch.description: With your Full Picture, you'll know exactly what you're looking for. It will help you explain to matchmakers, make better decisions, and save time.

result.title: The Result: Clarity and Confidence
result.description: Instead of saying "someone nice," you'll be able to explain exactly what communication style is important to you, which values are non-negotiable, and what dynamic you're looking for. It changes everything.

worldsSection.title: Your Journey Through 5 Worlds
worldsSection.subtitle: Each world reveals another layer of who you truly are and what's important to you in a relationship

fast.description: Only 20-30 minutes. You can start, stop, and return at any time. Your progress is saved automatically.

private.title: Private and Secure

instantResult.title: Instant Result

PERSONALITY.title: World of Personality
PERSONALITY.description: The foundation of who you are and how you operate in the world.
PERSONALITY.whyIsItImportant: So we can find the complementary half to your puzzle, we need to get to know all the pieces. Here, our goal is not to label you, but to understand your internal dynamics.
benefits: How do you recharge your social energy?
What is your approach to handling challenges?
PERSONALITY.guidingThought: Self-understanding is the first step to finding someone who will understand you.

VALUES.title: World of Values
VALUES.description: The internal compass that guides your life decisions.
VALUES.whyIsItImportant: A relationship based solely on initial chemistry encounters difficulties when real life begins. This world is the most important for preventing vast gaps in worldview.
benefits: What is your definition of a 'rich life'?
What are the stories that have shaped your value system?
Where do your life priorities lie?
VALUES.guidingThought: A successful relationship is a meeting of two value systems that know how to walk in the same direction.

RELATIONSHIP.title: World of Partnership
RELATIONSHIP.description: Your vision for partnership, intimacy, and daily life.
RELATIONSHIP.whyIsItImportant: A good relationship is a practical partnership. Here we map your emotional needs and communication style to find someone whose 'formula' for a relationship complements yours.
benefits: What is your 'formula' for sharing household responsibilities?
How do you react to disappointment in a relationship?
What is the right balance for you between 'togetherness' and 'aloneness'?
RELATIONSHIP.guidingThought: The goal is to find a person with whom you will not only share experiences but also build a future.

PARTNER.title: World of the Partner
PARTNER.description: Defining the essential traits and values for you in a partner.
PARTNER.whyIsItImportant: A search that is too 'open' leads to wasted time and energy. By defining non-negotiable core traits, you allow us to work for you in a smart and focused manner.
benefits: What is the one character trait that a partner must have?
What type of 'intelligence' is most important to you?
PARTNER.guidingThought: Focusing the search is not about limiting options, but about increasing the chance of finding the right one.

RELIGION.title: Religion & Tradition
RELIGION.description: Your connection to tradition, faith, and building a Jewish home.
RELIGION.whyIsItImportant: To avoid future misunderstandings, we need to understand the finest nuances of your connection to Judaism. This is the foundation for harmony in building a faithful home in Israel.
benefits: What is the central experience you seek from Shabbat?
What is your vision for the spiritual atmosphere in your home?
What is your degree of flexibility on halachic gaps?
RELIGION.guidingThought: The goal is to find a person with whom you can grow spiritually, not just live alongside.

answer.content: Yes, progress is saved automatically when you complete a section or switch worlds.

answer.title: Tip:
answer.content: Make sure to log in so progress is saved to your account.
The full questionnaire takes about 30-40 minutes, but you can do it in stages.

required-questions.question: Do I have to answer everything?

answer.content: No, only questions marked as 'Required *' are mandatory.
However, more answers lead to better matches.
We analyze your personality and values profile using both professional matchmakers and smart algorithms to find compatible partners.
Only our matchmaking team sees your full answers. Matches see only general info and shared interests.
Your privacy is our top priority.
Yes, you can edit your answers at any time via your profile.
It indicates the potential compatibility based on values, lifestyle, and personality traits.
You can still get matches if you answer the required questions, but accuracy improves with completion.
Inactive profiles are paused after a long period. Logging in reactivates your profile.
